text: Kim Ga-eul (; born 24 September 2002) is a South Korean dancer, rapper and singer-songwriter under Starship Entertainment. She is known for being the oldest member of the South Korean girl group Ive. == Career == === Novemberâ€“December 2021: Debut with IVE === On November 4, 2021, Gaeul was revealed as the second member of IVE. The group debuted on December 1 with their first single album "Eleven". == Personal Life == Gaeul is the youngest of her parents' two children; she has an older brother that was born in 1999. == References == Category:2002 births Category:J-pop singers Category:K-pop singers Category:Living people Category:People from Incheon Category:South Korean singer-songwriters Category:Ive (group)
title: Kim Ga-eul
